# Sagawa Memorial Museum of Shinto and Japanese Culture, Kogakkan University

| opened_date         = 26 October 1992
| inauguration_date   =

| demolition_date     =

}}
is a university museum that opened in Ise, Mie Prefecture, Japan in 1992. The collection and displays recount Japanese history, culture, religion, and thought through a focus on Shinto and Shinto shrines.
See also
* Ise-Shima National Park
* Ise Shrine
References
External links
